name: (Alpha) Brawlway - The Beginning
description:
Hello everyone. This is the first alpha prototype game from Cicada Studios, called BrawlWay. It's not very long and more of a proof of concept than anything else.

With that said, we'd love feedback and thoughts. The gameplay is pretty simple:

Space = Punch
Lctrl = Block (This fills up your punch meter when you block fireballs)
Lalt = Special Punch (This is the only way to damage the final boss)

The game is hard, so give it a few tries before you dismiss it. Thanks and enjoy.

-matthew & ian
